role: Ye was given th' %%role%% role due t' yer rank on th' server.
nameChangeDisclaimer: Keep in mind that ye does nah need t' verify yerself again if ye change yer name!
error: We could nah verify ye because ye did nah set yer Discord on Hypixel properly!
tutorial: In order t' be verified, ye must set yer Discord on Hypixel t' %%tag%% and wait up t' 10 minutes t' execute th' command again. Follow th' instructions in th' video below if ye do nah know how t' do 'tis.
